about.tool.title: About This Tool
about.tool.body: BaconTileSetter is a free, browser-based tileset generator for game developers. Upload 5 tile images and generate a complete spritesheet for 16-tile or 47-tile autotile systems — entirely in your browser, with no data sent to any server.

terms.use.title: Usage
terms.use.body: BaconTileSetter is provided free of charge for personal and commercial use. You may use the tool to generate tilesets for any project, including commercial games, without restriction.

terms.ownership.body: All generated content (PNG spritesheets, JSON metadata) is owned entirely by the user who generated it. No rights are claimed by the developer.

terms.warranty.body: This tool is provided "as is" without any warranty of any kind, express or implied. The developer is not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use this tool.
terms.privacy.title: Privacy
terms.privacy.body: BaconTileSetter operates entirely in your browser. No images, files, or personal data are uploaded to any server. Your language preference is stored locally in your browser.
